function Navigation({ activePage, logo }) { const menuOpenIcon = document.getElementById("menuOpenIcon"); const menuClosedIcon = document.getElementById("menuClosedIcon"); var navigationOpen = false; const toggleNavIcon = () => { navigationOpen = !navigationOpen; if(!navigationOpen){ menuOpenIcon.classList.add("hidden"); menuOpenIcon.remove("block"); menuClosedIcon.classList.add("block"); menuClosedIcon.classList.remove("hidden"); }else{ menuOpenIcon.classList.add("block"); menuOpenIcon.remove("hidden"); menuClosedIcon.classList.add("hidden"); menuClosedIcon.classList.remove("block"); } } return (
